label: InformationSource
comment: A person, organization, thing or place from which information comes, arises or is obtained.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a category for this cross-border regulatory procedure, such as the appendices of the CITES Convention.
A content, expressed as text, of this note.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
Security information, expressed as text, of this specified information source.
A website Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this specified marketplace.

referencedBy.comment: A specified cooperative information source used for or from this cooperating organization.
